name: La grande boucle race cycling games 4 kids riders
name_original: La grande boucle race cycling games 4 kids riders
description:
Who told you that our kids will never ever race and blast aliens by painting on "Tour de France" ? It's time to ride kid' cycle in Tour de France:race cycling games for kids riders !

Indeed our young rider have chance to :
Pick up their favourite colorful, powerful cycles,
Love cycling and racing in one of awesome kid racing games,
Discover awesome Tour de France landscapes !

What is the exciting mission of our adventurer in that story racing game ?
Tour de France almost starts : our kid meet many teams from all around the world. Hurry up, kid, put on your jersey from your favorite team.
Then picked up your colorful cycle in that funny cycling app.


Are you ready ? Take your marks, line up : 1, 2, 3, GO !

After few meters, and have been shoved inside the cycle pro riders, you may distancing competitors ! But stay on the alive. We never know.
On the racing road, please pay attention on ambulance, cars, firetrucks, police motorbikes and cars. Watch out for some unwary pedestrians as cheeky animals, or family members cross your racing road too.
Pick up food, water to keep going strong.

During night you may be teased by some cheeky cute "aliens" and more !
Feel free to shoot and blast the most cheeky aliens trying to ruin your race.

Will you be strong enough to finish your race and win on beautiful "Champs Elysées' avenue" ?

Take your chance in one of the funny cycling racing games for now !
